2  import smbus
3 except:
4  print 'Try sudo apt-get install python-smbus'

6 from time import sleep
7 
8 # Models
9 MODEL_02BA = 0
10 MODEL_30BA = 1
11 
12 # Oversampling options
13 OSR_256 = 0
14 OSR_512 = 1
15 OSR_1024 = 2
16 OSR_2048 = 3
17 OSR_4096 = 4
18 OSR_8192 = 5
19 
20 # kg/m^3 convenience
21 DENSITY_FRESHWATER = 997
22 DENSITY_SALTWATER = 1029
23 
24 # Conversion factors (from native unit, mbar)
25 UNITS_Pa = 100.0
26 UNITS_hPa = 1.0
27 UNITS_kPa = 0.1
28 UNITS_mbar = 1.0
29 UNITS_bar = 0.001
30 UNITS_atm = 0.000986923
31 UNITS_Torr = 0.750062
32 UNITS_psi = 0.014503773773022
33 
34 # Valid units
35 UNITS_Centigrade = 1
36 UNITS_Farenheit = 2
37 UNITS_Kelvin = 3

39 
40 class MS5837(object):
41 
42  # Registers
43  _MS5837_ADDR = 0x76
44  _MS5837_RESET = 0x1E
45  _MS5837_ADC_READ = 0x00
46  _MS5837_PROM_READ = 0xA0
47  _MS5837_CONVERT_D1_256 = 0x40
48  _MS5837_CONVERT_D2_256 = 0x50
49 
50  def __init__(self, model=MODEL_30BA, bus=1):
51  self._model = model
52 
53  try:
54  self._bus = smbus.SMBus(bus)
55  except:
56  print("Bus %d is not available.") % bus
57  print("Available busses are listed as /dev/i2c*")
58  self._bus = None
59 
60  self._fluidDensity = DENSITY_FRESHWATER
61  self._pressure = 0
62  self._temperature = 0
63  self._D1 = 0
64  self._D2 = 0
65 
66  def init(self):
67  if self._bus is None:
68  "No bus!"
69  return False
70 
71  self._bus.write_byte(self._MS5837_ADDR, self._MS5837_RESET)
72 
73  # Wait for reset to complete
74  sleep(0.01)
75 
76  self._C = []
77 
78  # Read calibration values and CRC
79  for i in range(7):
80  c = self._bus.read_word_data(self._MS5837_ADDR, self._MS5837_PROM_READ + 2*i)
81  c = ((c & 0xFF) << 8) | (c >> 8) # SMBus is little-endian for word transfers, we need to swap MSB and LSB
82  self._C.append(c)
83 
84  crc = (self._C[0] & 0xF000) >> 12
85  if crc != self._crc4(self._C):
86  print "PROM read error, CRC failed!"
87  return False
88 
89  return True
90 
91  def read(self, oversampling=OSR_8192):
92  if self._bus is None:
93  print "No bus!"
94  return False
95 
96  if oversampling < OSR_256 or oversampling > OSR_8192:
97  print "Invalid oversampling option!"
98  return False
99 
100  # Request D1 conversion (temperature)
101  self._bus.write_byte(self._MS5837_ADDR, self._MS5837_CONVERT_D1_256 + 2*oversampling)
102 
103  # Maximum conversion time increases linearly with oversampling
104  # max time (seconds) ~= 2.2e-6(x) where x = OSR = (2^8, 2^9, ..., 2^13)
105  # We use 2.5e-6 for some overhead
106  sleep(2.5e-6 * 2**(8+oversampling))
107 
108  d = self._bus.read_i2c_block_data(self._MS5837_ADDR, self._MS5837_ADC_READ, 3)
109  self._D1 = d[0] << 16 | d[1] << 8 | d[2]
110 
111  # Request D2 conversion (pressure)
112  self._bus.write_byte(self._MS5837_ADDR, self._MS5837_CONVERT_D2_256 + 2*oversampling)
113 
114  # As above
115  sleep(2.5e-6 * 2**(8+oversampling))
116 
117  d = self._bus.read_i2c_block_data(self._MS5837_ADDR, self._MS5837_ADC_READ, 3)
118  self._D2 = d[0] << 16 | d[1] << 8 | d[2]
119 
120  # Calculate compensated pressure and temperature
121  # using raw ADC values and internal calibration
122  self._calculate()
123 
124  return True
125 
126  def setFluidDensity(self, denisty):
127  self._fluidDensity = denisty
128 
129  # Pressure in requested units
130  # mbar * conversion
131  def pressure(self, conversion=UNITS_mbar):
132  return self._pressure * conversion
133 
134  # Temperature in requested units
135  # default degrees C
136  def temperature(self, conversion=UNITS_Centigrade):
137  degC = self._temperature / 100.0
138  if conversion == UNITS_Farenheit:
139  return (9/5) * degC + 32
140  elif conversion == UNITS_Kelvin:
141  return degC - 273
142  return degC
143 
144  # Depth relative to MSL pressure in given fluid density
145  def depth(self):
146  return (self.pressure(UNITS_Pa)-101300)/(self._fluidDensity*9.80665)
147 
148  # Altitude relative to MSL pressure
149  def altitude(self):
150  return (1-pow((self.pressure()/1013.25),.190284))*145366.45*.3048
151 
152  # Cribbed from datasheet
153  def _calculate(self):
154  OFFi = 0
155  SENSi = 0
156  Ti = 0
157 
158  dT = self._D2-self._C[5]*256
159  if self._model == MODEL_02BA:
160  SENS = self._C[1]*65536+(self._C[3]*dT)/128
161  OFF = self._C[2]*131072+(self._C[4]*dT)/64
162  self._pressure = (self._D1*SENS/(2097152)-OFF)/(32768)
163  else:
164  SENS = self._C[1]*32768+(self._C[3]*dT)/256
165  OFF = self._C[2]*65536+(self._C[4]*dT)/128
166  self._pressure = (self._D1*SENS/(2097152)-OFF)/(8192)
167 
168  self._temperature = 2000+dT*self._C[6]/8388608
169 
170  # Second order compensation
171  if self._model == MODEL_02BA:
172  if (self._temperature/100) < 20: # Low temp
173  Ti = (11*dT*dT)/(34359738368)
174  OFFi = (31*(self._temperature-2000)*(self._temperature-2000))/8
175  SENSi = (63*(self._temperature-2000)*(self._temperature-2000))/32
176 
177  else:
178  if (self._temperature/100) < 20: # Low temp
179  Ti = (3*dT*dT)/(8589934592)
180  OFFi = (3*(self._temperature-2000)*(self._temperature-2000))/2
181  SENSi = (5*(self._temperature-2000)*(self._temperature-2000))/8
182  if (self._temperature/100) < -15: # Very low temp
183  OFFi = OFFi+7*(self._temperature+1500l)*(self._temperature+1500)
184  SENSi = SENSi+4*(self._temperature+1500l)*(self._temperature+1500)
185  elif (self._temperature/100) >= 20: # High temp
186  Ti = 2*(dT*dT)/(137438953472)
187  OFFi = (1*(self._temperature-2000)*(self._temperature-2000))/16
188  SENSi = 0
189 
190  OFF2 = OFF-OFFi
191  SENS2 = SENS-SENSi
192 
193  if self._model == MODEL_02BA:
194  self._temperature = (self._temperature-Ti)
195  self._pressure = (((self._D1*SENS2)/2097152-OFF2)/32768)/100.0
196  else:
197  self._temperature = (self._temperature-Ti)
198  self._pressure = (((self._D1*SENS2)/2097152-OFF2)/8192)/10.0
199 
200  # Cribbed from datasheet
201  def _crc4(self, n_prom):
202  n_rem = 0
203 
204  n_prom[0] = ((n_prom[0]) & 0x0FFF)
205  n_prom.append(0)
206 
207  for i in range(16):
208  if i%2 == 1:
209  n_rem ^= ((n_prom[i>>1]) & 0x00FF)
210  else:
211  n_rem ^= (n_prom[i>>1] >> 8)
212 
213  for n_bit in range(8,0,-1):
214  if n_rem & 0x8000:
215  n_rem = (n_rem << 1) ^ 0x3000
216  else:
217  n_rem = (n_rem << 1)
218 
219  n_rem = ((n_rem >> 12) & 0x000F)
220 
221  self.n_prom = n_prom
222  self.n_rem = n_rem
223 
224  return n_rem ^ 0x00
